---
title: "Toulouse, France"
---

The Pink City.

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE}
basiliqueSaintSernin <- paste("<b>Basilique Saint-Sernin</b>")
monastery <- paste("<b>Monastery</b>")
capitole <- paste("<b>Capitole</b>")
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  setView(-0.247289, 44.555854, zoom = 11) %>%
  addMarkers(-0.247289, 44.555854, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = basiliqueSaintSernin) %>% # Basilique Saint-Sernin
  addMarkers(-0.247289, 44.555854, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = monastery) %>% # Monastery
  addMarkers(-0.247289, 44.555854, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = capitole)  # Capitole
```
